long_description: The Old Town Heron 11 kayak supplies hefty doses of exactly what's needed for a memorable day on the water-fun! The Old Town Heron 11 kayak offer a bit more tracking and speed than its shorter, 9 ft. counterpart, but it displays the same maneuverability and stability on calm waters. Single-layer polyethylene stands up to tough aquatic environments, offers high value and cleans up in a flash. Comfort Flex seat moves with every stroke and adjusts to personalize your position in the cockpit; padding in the seat and backrest ensures daylong comfort. Adjustable footbraces ensure an efficient stroke and a comfortable paddling position. Seat features a beverage holder, and foam inserts in bow and stern increase flotation if water enters the cockpit. Bow and stern carry handles make transporting the 47 lb. Heron 11 kayak easy.
short_description: The Old Town Heron 11 kayak supplies hefty doses of exactly what's needed for a memorable day on the water-fun!
